statements: SELECT * FROM ev_components_warranty;
SELECT component_name, warranty_start_date, warranty_end_date FROM ev_components_warranty;
SELECT component_name, warranty_period_in_months FROM ev_components_warranty WHERE warranty_period_in_months > 12;
SELECT * FROM ev_components_warranty WHERE warranty_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT component_id, component_name FROM ev_components_warranty ORDER BY component_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ev_components_warranty WHERE component_id = 1;
SELECT component_name, warranty_start_date, warranty_end_date FROM ev_components_warranty WHERE warranty_period_in_months > 12 ORDER BY warranty_end_date DESC;
SELECT component_id, warranty_period_in_months FROM ev_components_warranty WHERE warranty_start_date > '2022-01-01' AND warranty_end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT component_name FROM ev_components_warranty WHERE warranty_end_date < '2022-12-31' AND warranty_period_in_months = 24 ORDER BY component_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ev_components_warranty WHERE warranty_period_in_months BETWEEN 6 AND 12 ORDER BY warranty_start_date DESC, component_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicle_components;
SELECT component_name, component_type FROM electric_vehicle_components;
SELECT component_name, warranty_start_date FROM electric_vehicle_components ORDER BY warranty_start_date DESC;
SELECT component_type, warranty_type, warranty_duration FROM electric_vehicle_components JOIN component_warranty ON electric_vehicle_components.component_id = component_warranty.component_id;

SELECT component_name, component_type, warranty_duration FROM electric_vehicle_components JOIN component_warranty ON electric_vehicle_components.component_id = component_warranty.component_id WHERE warranty_duration > 2;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicle_components WHERE component_name = 'Battery' ORDER BY warranty_start_date DESC;

SELECT component_name, warranty_type FROM electric_vehicle_components INNER JOIN component_warranty ON electric_vehicle_components.component_id = component_warranty.component_id WHERE warranty_duration > 2;
SELECT component_name, warranty_start_date, warranty_end_date FROM electric_vehicle_components WHERE warranty_start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND warranty_end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT component_name, warranty_start_date, warranty_end_date FROM electric_vehicle_components WHERE component_type IN ('Charger', 'Inverter') ORDER BY component_name ASC;

SELECT component_name, component_type, warranty_type FROM electric_vehicle_components INNER JOIN component_warranty ON electric_vehicle_components.component_id = component_warranty.component_id WHERE warranty_type = 'Extended' AND warranty_duration > 3;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicle_components;
SELECT component_name, warranty_period FROM electric_vehicle_components;
SELECT warranty_end_date, warranty_start_date FROM vehicle_warranty;
SELECT component_id, warranty_status FROM component_warranty;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicle_components WHERE component_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicle_components;
SELECT component_name, warranty_period FROM electric_vehicle_components ORDER BY warranty_period DESC;

SELECT component_name, warranty_period, warranty_status FROM electric_vehicle_components INNER JOIN component_warranty ON electric_vehicle_components.component_id = component_warranty.component_id WHERE warranty_status = 'Active';

SELECT electric_vehicle_components.component_name, vehicle_id, warranty_start_date, warranty_end_date FROM electric_vehicle_components JOIN component_warranty ON electric_vehicle_components.component_id = component_warranty.component_id JOIN vehicle_warranty ON vehicle_warranty.vehicle_id = component_warranty.vehicle_id WHERE warranty_end_date > '2022-12-31';

SELECT component_name, COUNT(*) AS total_warranties FROM electric_vehicle_components JOIN component_warranty ON electric_vehicle_components.component_id = component_warranty.component_id GROUP BY component_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM ElectricVehicles;
SELECT id, vehicle_model, manufacturer FROM ElectricVehicles ORDER BY production_year DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT manufacturer FROM ElectricVehicles;
SELECT vehicle_model, production_year FROM ElectricVehicles WHERE manufacturer='Tesla';
SELECT vehicle_model, warranty_expiry_date FROM ElectricVehicles WHERE warranty_expiry_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM ElectricVehicles WHERE production_year > 2015;
SELECT manufacturer, vehicle_model FROM ElectricVehicles WHERE warranty_expiry_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM WarrantyProviders WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_components FROM ElectricVehicles JOIN Components ON ElectricVehicles.vehicle_model = Components.vehicle_model GROUP BY manufacturer;

SELECT Components.component_name, WarrantyProviders.provider_name FROM Components JOIN ComponentWarranty ON Components.id = ComponentWarranty.component_id JOIN WarrantyProviders ON ComponentWarranty.warranty_provider_id = WarrantyProviders.id;
SELECT * FROM Manufacturer;
SELECT vehicle_model, warranty_period FROM VehicleWarranty ORDER BY warranty_period DESC;
SELECT component_name, warranty_start_date, warranty_end_date FROM ComponentWarranty WHERE warranty_period > 2;
SELECT manufacturer_name, contact_number FROM Manufacturer WHERE manufacturer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ComponentInventory WHERE price < 1000;
SELECT * FROM ComponentWarranty WHERE warranty_period > 2;
SELECT component_name, warranty_start_date, warranty_end_date FROM ComponentWarranty ORDER BY warranty_start_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as TotalComponents FROM ComponentInventory WHERE available_quantity > 0;
SELECT manufacturer_name, contact_number FROM Manufacturer WHERE manufacturer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT vehicle_model, purchase_date FROM VehicleOwnership WHERE owner_contact LIKE '%123%';
